backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, song management, likes, plays, and playlist storage with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend files' functionality across UI, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS root theme variables and dark mode definitions with base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the app root and main entry script with metadata and manifest link.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, start URL, and categories.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching for app shell and custom audio fetch handling with offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing screen navigation, deep links, and providers for theme and settings.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppHead: Header displaying app branding with icon, title, and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeChannel: UI for displaying and managing a customizable home banner image via upload or URL.
Provides the main application layout with starfield background, header, sidebar, footer, and bottom tab bar, wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Displays user playlists with create-playlist functionality and authentication checks, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryT: Renders top tabs for switching between Songs and Playlists in the library section.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Shows a mobile-friendly bottom navigation bar with icons, highlighting the active screen and handling navigation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Implements mobile and desktop sidebars with navigation items and an Add to Home Screen action.
frontend/src/components/player/MusicPlay: Audio player component handling playback, seeking, volume, metadata, and play-count incrementing for a selected song.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSBanner.t: Displays a dismissible banner prompting users to install the app to their home screen via A2HS.
frontend/src/components/songs/CreatePlay: Provides a dialog or drawer for creating a new playlist and adding a song to it, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/songs/DownloadCh: Provides a dialog or drawer for choosing between offline caching or device download, with mobile-specific UI behavior.
frontend/src/components/songs/Horizontal: Renders a compact horizontal song card with artwork, play button, and engagement bar, supporting play state visuals.
Displays a titled horizontal scrollable row for song cards using a ScrollArea with a horizontal scrollbar.
frontend/src/components/songs/PlaylistCh: Shows a dialog or drawer listing user playlists and allows toggling a song's inclusion with loading and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongCard.t: A stylized card showing song artwork, metadata, engagement bar, and controls for play, delete, and overflow actions.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEditor: Implements a dialog-based form for adding new songs, supporting metadata entry and file uploads with validation.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEngage: Displays like and play counts with optional like button handling authentication and interaction events.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongListRo: Renders a list-style row for a song with artwork, metadata, engagement bar, and controls for play, delete, and overflow actions.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongOverfl: Provides a mobile/desktop overflow menu for song actions like favorites, playlists, downloads, sharing, and offline caching with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongsSortB: Renders a dropdown selector to sort songs by latest, most liked, or most heard.
frontend/src/components/visual/Starfield: Generates an animated starfield background in dark mode, respecting reduced animation settings.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Defines feature flags, currently enabling a desktop bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Handles PWA add‑to‑home‑screen prompt availability and triggering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBanner.ts: Manages persistent home banner image state, supporting URLs, uploads, validation, and fallback images.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Exposes media query matching and a helper hook to detect mobile viewports.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend song and playlist queries and mutations using React Query, including search, likes, and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Stores and persists user settings like audio quality and animation preferences, updating DOM classes when needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongEngagement.ts: Provides like and play handlers for songs with authentication checks and mutation wiring.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Provides a React context for light/dark theme with localStorage persistence and helper hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes with form input adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutArtistScreen.tsx: Displays an about page for the artist with descriptive text and links to social platforms.
frontend/src/pages/ContactScreen.tsx: Renders a contact page with email link and introductory message.
frontend/src/pages/CustomSongRequestsScr: Shows a page for requesting custom songs with support and email links.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Main home view showing new, top, and all songs with player controls and song management actions.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryScreen.tsx: Displays the user's library with tabs for songs and playlists plus an integrated music player.
frontend/src/pages/SearchScreen.tsx: Provides song search with live results, a music player, and keyword-based filtering.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsScreen.tsx: Renders settings UI for audio quality, visual effects, and notifications using switches and selectors tied to useSettings.
frontend/src/pages/SongsScreen.tsx: Displays all songs with sorting, playback controls, deletion, and deep‑link handling.
frontend/src/pages/SupportScreen.tsx: Shows support info and a link to buy the creator a coffee.
frontend/src/pages/ThemesScreen.tsx: Provides UI to switch between light and dark themes using useTheme.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Builds, parses, and clears deep‑link URLs for songs using query or hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers to validate audio URLs, generate filenames, and trigger audio file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/offlineAudioCache.ts: Manages optional offline caching of audio files via the Cache API.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Wraps Web Share API and clipboard operations for sharing song links or text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters or hash query params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color system, animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state descriptor outlining build goals, UI specs, themes, image requirements, and known issues for the MVRIO Night PWA.
